creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: baby lying in a cloth bundle, playing with a string
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [(SUCRE, BOLIVIA) / BABY-- / CORNER OF THE MARKET]
title: Baby--Corner of the Market, Sucre, Bolivia
